.. _specs.tera:

===============
Lino Tera specs
===============

**Lino Tera** (from Italian *terapia*, therapy) is a Lino application
designed to be used in a center for `sociopsychological
<https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Social_psychology>`_ consultations.
